push_button.description: Push the button to start the microwave.

shut_door.description: Shut the microwave door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it outwards.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the microwave body to remove any spills or stains.

clean_rotation_tray.description: Clean the microwave's rotation tray to remove food particles.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the body, door, and button.
